item.title: An Adventure with Swift Charts
item.description: This post was original posted on mobile.blog. As you all may already know, one of the cool new things introduced in WWDC 2022 was Swift Charts, a framework to create charts with SwiftUI. To learn more about the Swift Charts’ potential, let’s go on a thrilling adventure to replace the chart in WooCommerce iOS with this ✨✨ shiny new framework ✨✨. To get started, here’s what the chart currently looks like in WooCommerce iOS.
